todos.title: Regular Vet Visits
todos.content: Ensure your pet has regular check-ups with the vet to monitor their health and catch any potential issues early.

todos.title: Balanced Diet
todos.content: Provide your pet with a balanced diet tailored to their specific needs. Consult your vet for recommendations.

todos.title: Exercise
todos.content: Regular exercise is essential for your pet's physical and mental well-being. Make sure they get plenty of playtime.

todos.title: Hydration
todos.content: Make sure your pet always has access to fresh, clean water. Proper hydration is crucial for their health.

todos.title: Dental Care
todos.content: Regularly brush your pet's teeth and provide dental treats to help maintain their oral health.

todos.title: Vaccinations
todos.content: Keep your pet's vaccinations up to date to protect them from common diseases and infections.

todos.title: Parasite Prevention
todos.content: Use preventive treatments to protect your pet from fleas, ticks, and worms. Regularly check them for signs of infestation.

todos.title: Grooming
todos.content: Regular grooming helps keep your pet's coat clean and reduces shedding. It also provides an opportunity to check for skin issues.

todos.title: Mental Stimulation
todos.content: Provide toys, puzzles, and activities to keep your pet mentally stimulated and prevent boredom.

todos.title: Safe Environment
todos.content: Ensure your pet's living environment is safe and free from hazards. Keep harmful substances out of reach.

todos.title: Weight Management
todos.content: Monitor your pet's weight and adjust their diet and exercise routine as needed to maintain a healthy weight.

todos.title: Socialization
todos.content: Socialize your pet with other animals and people to promote good behavior and reduce anxiety.

todos.title: Comfortable Sleeping Area
todos.content: Provide a comfortable and quiet sleeping area for your pet to ensure they get adequate rest.

todos.title: Spaying/Neutering
todos.content: Consider spaying or neutering your pet to prevent unwanted litters and reduce the risk of certain health issues.

todos.title: Training
todos.content: Consistent training helps your pet learn good behavior and strengthens the bond between you and your pet.
